thread.title: India's industrial output up 7.5 percent in January

title: India's industrial output up 7.5 percent in January
text: March 12, 2018 / 12:23 PM / Updated 9 hours ago India's industrial output up 7.5 percent in January Reuters Staff 1 Min Read NEW DELHI (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s industrial output grew 7.5 percent in January from a year earlier, government data showed on Monday. Workers make pipes used for drilling, at a factory in an industrial area in Mumbai, India January 29, 2018. REUTERS/Danish Siddiqui Economists surveyed by Reuters had forecast 6.7 percent growth in output compared with a 7.1 percent year-on-year increase in December. Reporting by Malini Menon
